name: Sunken Temple
description: A sacred temple now rests beneath the water, its religious significance and magical protections still intact despite the flooding. The underwater environment creates unique exploration challenges, while the preserved religious artifacts and magical items can be extremely valuable or dangerous.
atmosphere: Sacred architecture rises through water like drowned cathedral. Cold water carries old incense and divine mystery scent. Ancient religious symbols glow with eerie light despite depths. Skin tingles with presence of ancient magical protections. Taste of salt and divine power fills mouth. Weight of religious significance and underwater mystery presses down on you.
